entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
